The daily life self-care ability scale (ADL) was used to assess
Can eat any normal diet, food can be done by others (10 points)
The patient will eat his own food (5 points)
Must be able to get in and out of the bathroom and scrub; the shower does not have to be assisted or supervised independently (5 points)
Refers to 24~48 hours, the caregiver provides tools, but also to 5 points, such as squeezing toothpaste, ready water and so on (5 points)
Should be able to wear any clothes (10 points)
The patient can put on his coat (5 points)
1 times a week out of control (5 points)
For 24~48 hours, the patient with the catheter can manage the catheter independently and 10 points (10 points)
The patient should be able to go to the toilet and leave (10 minutes)
Bed chair transfer (refers to the activity in the house, which can be assisted by auxiliary tools. For example, a wheelchair must be able to turn around or go out on its own without help)
1 untrained person to help, including supervision or care (10 points)
1 strong person/skilled person / 2 personal help, can stand (5 points)
Can go upstairs independently with auxiliary tools (10 points)

The subjects are seated. Double grounded. Put your hands on your legs. Straighten your back and keep your eyes straight ahead. 
 1 level balance: static balance. The subjects were able to stay seated in an uncluttered or moving torso. 
 2 level balance: automatic dynamic balance. The subject is able to shift the center of gravity in all directions beyond the base surface and to maintain a balance in the absence of external chaos. 
 3 balance: he moves dynamically. The subjects were able to maintain balance in all directions.

Seat taken by the person under test. Both feet are shoulder width apart. Natural droop of both hands. Straighten your back and eyes straight ahead. 
 1 level balance: static balance. The subjects were able to maintain an end position without any disturbances or trunk movements. 
 2 level balance: automatic dynamic balancing. The subjects were able to keep the center of gravity above the base surface in all directions without any disturbances and to maintain balance. 
 3 level balance: he moves dynamic balance. The subjects were able to maintain balance in all directions and disturbances.

If the applicant has submitted evidence and has been confirmed by a qualified assessor, the applicant belongs to the difficult group prescribed by the government and conforms to:①Severe impairment of living/cognitive abilities (disability);②Coma/delirium;③Binocular blindness; or④
Any one of them， The applicant should, in principle, do not need to conduct a systematic assessment beyond the necessary information collection and confirmation, directly into the service plan.
（2）Daily life capacity（An individual who has to perform daily, basic, and common-sense body movements for independent living）
1. Eat (food from containers to mouth, chewing, swallowing, etc.)
4. Clothing (clothing, buckles, lala chains, shoe socks, shoelaces, etc.)
7. Use the toilet (including going to the bathroom, untangling the pants, wiping the pants, and flushing the water)
（3）State of mind (individuals in cognitive functions, behaviors, emotions, etc.)
Test question: "I say three things, please repeat, and remember, will ask you later" : apple, watch, national flag
（1）Picture clock test: "please draw a circular clock here and mark 10:45 on the clock."
（2）Recall words: "now please tell me, what I want you to remember three things is what?"
(It doesn\'t have to be in order)
Please make the bell in this picture：
（4）SensoryPerceptionAndCommunication(individual competence in consciousness level, vision, hearing, communication and so on)
2.Vision (if you wear a presbyopic or a nearsighted mirror, you should evaluate it in the case of glasses.)
3.Hearing (if you normally wear a hearing aid, you should evaluate it in the case of hearing AIDS)
（5）SocialParticipation(the ability to connect and communicate with people and the environment)
4.If the initial level is determined as "3 heavy loss energy", then the above 1-3 conditions will not be considered and the level will not be improved.

string-array.name: array_jzhj
string-array.item: The evening light is insufficient or without illumination, including living room, bedroom, kitchen, toilet, corridor
The ground passages that the elderly often walk are broken, wire or carpet, and clutter
The bathroom and toilet are narrow, the switch is broken, the pipe is leaking, there is no shower curtain, the bathtub is not slippery, the outdoor toilet, no handrail
Kitchen stove is in dangerous working condition, no refrigerator/no normal working, rats pest infestation
Home has acute Angle, not fixed, influence indoor activity
The elderly have difficulty in entering or leaving their homes or rooms, including steps, doors, or buildings without elevators

string-array.name: array_js
string-array.item: 10points Independent eating (food prepared for food at a reasonable time)
5points Need some help (help in the eating process, such as helping to control the cutlery)
0points Need to be extremely helpful or completely dependent on others, or have a nutrition tube

string-array.name: array_xz
string-array.item: 5points After preparing the bath water, you can complete the bathing process independently
0points Need help in the process of bathing

string-array.name: array_xs
string-array.item: 5points You can do it on your own

string-array.name: array_cy
string-array.item: 5points Need some help (to be able to wear off, but others help to organize clothing, buckle/shoelace, lala chain)
0points To be extremely helpful or totally dependent on others

string-array.name: array_dbkz
string-array.item: 5points Occasionally out of control (< 1 times a week), or need to be prompted
0points Completely out of control, or indwelling catheters

string-array.name: array_xbkz
string-array.item: 5points Occasionally out of control (< 1 times a week, but > once a week), or need to be prompted
0points Completely out of control, or indwelling catheters

string-array.name: array_rc
string-array.item: 5points Need some help (help others to go to the toilet, need other people to help flush the water or clean the pants, etc.)
0points To be extremely helpful or totally dependent on others

string-array.name: array_cyzy
string-array.item: 10points To help (help others to support or use crutches)
5points Great help (depending on others to help and help)

string-array.name: array_pdxz
string-array.item: 15points Can walk 45 meters on the ground independently
10points Need some help (because of physical disability, poor balance ability, excessive weakness, vision, etc., to a certain extent need to be assisted by others or use crutches, AIDS, etc.)
5points Need to be greatly helpful (because of physical disability, poor balance ability, excessive weakness, vision, etc., depending on others to support, or in a wheelchair to move on its own)

string-array.name: array_sxlt
string-array.item: 10points Up and down stairs (10 to 15 steps up and down)
5points Need partial help (to be supported by others, or to support the stairs, use crutches, etc.)
0points To be extremely helpful or totally dependent on others

string-array.name: array_hdfj
string-array.item: 0 Excellent ability: a total of 100 points
3 Serious injury: total score is less than 40

string-array.name: array_rzgn
string-array.item: 0point Draw a clock correctly (draw a closed circle, the position of the needle is accurate), and you can recall two or three words
1point Draw a clock error (the round is not closed, or the pointer position is not accurate), or just recall 0-1 words
2point Identified as cognitive impairment, such as alzheimer\'s

string-array.name: array_gjxw
string-array.item: 0point No physical aggression (such as hitting/kicking/pushing/biting/scratching/falling) and verbal aggression (e.g., swearing, language threat, screaming)
1point There are several physical attacks a month, or several times a week
2point There are several physical attacks a week, or a daily verbal attack

string-array.name: array_yyzz
string-array.item: 1point Depressed, not to talk, not to wash, not to activities

string-array.name: array_jsztfj
string-array.item: 0 The ability is good: the total score is 0

string-array.name: array_gzjjgt
string-array.item: 2. Vision (if you wear a presbyopic or a nearsighted mirror, you should evaluate it in the case of glasses.)
3. Hearing (if you normally wear a hearing aid, you should evaluate it in the case of hearing AIDS)

string-array.name: array_yssp
string-array.item: 0point Be conscious and alert to the surroundings

1point Lethargy, which manifests as overextended sleep. When calling or pushing the patient\'s body to wake up, and to engage in proper conversation or instructions, stop the stimulation and go back to sleep

2point Lethargy, general external stimuli cannot make its awakening, giving a strong sense of stimulation can have a short awake, wake up can short answer questions, when the stimulus weakened and then to sleep soon

3point Coma, in the shallow coma of the pain stimulus of avoidance and painful expression; In a deep coma, no response to stimulation (if a coma is assessed, a severe disability is assessed directly, and the following items are not assessed).

string-array.name: array_sl
string-array.item: 0point Can read the standard font in the book
1point You can see the large font, but you can\'t read the standard font on the book
2point The eyesight is limited, can not see the newspaper headline, but can recognize the object
3point It is difficult to identify objects, but the eyes can move with objects and see only light, color and shape
4point Without vision, eyes cannot move with objects

string-array.name: array_tl
string-array.item: 0point Can talk normally, can hear the sound of TV, telephone, doorbell
1point You can\'t hear when you\'re talking or speaking at a distance of more than 2 meters
2point Normal communication is difficult to hear in a quiet ring or loud voice
3point The speaker spoke loudly or spoke slowly, only to be heard in part

string-array.name: array_gtjl
string-array.item: 0point No difficulty in communicating and communicating with others
1point Be able to express your needs and understand others, but you need time or help
2point Expressing needs or understanding is difficult and requires frequent repetition or reduced verbal expression
3point Unable to express the need or understanding of others

string-array.name: array_gzjygtfj
string-array.item: 0 Ability to be in good condition: consciousness, vision and hearing rated 0 or 1, communication rated 0
1 Mild impairment: conscious, but at least one of the visual or auditory acuity of 2, or 1.

2 Moderately impaired: conscious, but at least one of the visual or auditory acuity was rated as 3, or communication was rated 2; Or sleepiness, visual acuity or hearing rating of 3 and below, the communication rating is 2 and below.
3 Severe impairment: conscious or lethargic, but at least 4 in sight or hearing, or 3 in communication. Or lethargy/coma

string-array.name: array_shcyx
string-array.item: 6. Social participation in the total score

string-array.name: array_shnl
string-array.item: 0point In addition to personal life (such as eating, washing, dressing, and two), you can take care of household chores (such as cooking, washing) or managing your own affairs
1point In addition to personal life, can do housework, but owes good, the family affairs arrangement is not organized
2point Personal life can be self-care; Only with the help of others can do some housework, but the quality is not good
3point Personal basic life affairs can be self-care (such as diet, 2), can wash gargle under the supervision
4point Basic personal life (e.g., diet, 2) need some help or rely entirely on others for help

string-array.name: array_gznl
string-array.item: 0point Skilled mental work or manual work can be done as usual
1point The skilled mental work or manual skills have decreased
2point The original skilled mental work or manual technique work is less than in the past, partial forgetting
3point There are only a few fragments of skilled work, and all skills are forgotten
4point All previous knowledge or skills have been obliterate

string-array.name: array_sjkjdx
string-array.item: 0point The concept of time (year, month, day and time) is clear; It can take a long distance to learn the orientation of the new environment

1point The concept of time has been falling, year, month and day are clear, but sometimes the difference is several days; You can go to the street, know the name and location of the place, but don\'t know the way home
2point The concept of time is poor, and the year, month and date are not clear. Can only act alone in the neighborhood, only known to the current residence, do not know the location

3point The concept of time is very poor, the year, the month, the day is not clear, knows the morning or afternoon; It can only be in the left and right side of the door, the name and location of the place
4point No sense of time; Can\'t go out alone

string-array.name: array_rwdx
string-array.item: 0point Knowing the relationships of people around you, knowing the meaning of titles such as grandparents, uncles, aunts, nephews and nieces; The approximate age and identity of a stranger can be distinguished
1point The relationship between close relatives and close relatives in the home will not tell the general age of strangers, or strangers
2point Can only address the family member, or can only as the same title, do not know its relation, does not distinguish the generations
3point Only those who live together can be called children or grandchildren, acquaintances and strangers
4point Only the protector, not the acquaintances and strangers

string-array.name: array_shjwnl
string-array.item: 0point Participate in the society, in the social environment to have certain adaptability, to be suitable for people
1point Can adapt to simple environment, active contact person, at the beginning of meeting is difficult to let a person discover intelligence problem, cannot understand metaphor language
2point Out of society, can be passive contact, will not take initiative, in the conversation many uncomfortable words, easy to be cheated
3point It\'s hard to socialize with people, talk about things, and look inappropriate
4point It\'s hard to get in touch with people

3.In the coma, the direct assessment is severe disability;

string-array.name: array_SF_Instruction
string-array.item: What day is today? A few days? A few months? In which year? What season?
Where are we now? What street? How many floors is this? Which city? What country?
I\'ll tell you three things. You listen to me: "the ball, the flag, the trees", please repeat it. Ok, please remember, I will ask you later, please say it again.
Would you please calculate 100~7? And then we\'re going to go down by 7, until I stop. (5 times)
Could you please recall the three things that I asked you to remember just now?
(show your watch) what\'s this? (show pen) what\'s this?
Now I will say a word, please repeat it clearly to me. "Forty-four lions"
I\'ll give you a piece of paper to do as I say: "take this piece of paper with your right hand, fold it in half, and put it on your lap."

resources.string: 9.Reading comprehension (to be able to read silently, to give points)
The furniture has an acute Angle：

The subjects are seated. Double grounded. Put your hands on your legs. Straighten your back and keep your eyes straight ahead. 
Level 1 balance: static balance. The subjects were able to stay seated in an uncluttered or moving torso. 
Level 2 balance: automatic dynamic balance. The subject is able to shift the center of gravity in all directions beyond the base surface and to maintain a balance in the absence of external chaos. 
Level 3 balance: he dynamic balance. The subjects were able to maintain balance in all directions.

The subjects were upright. Feet shoulder-width apart. Hang your hands naturally. Straighten your back and keep your eyes straight ahead. 
Level 1 balance: static balance. The subjects were able to maintain an upright position in an uncluttered or physical motion. 
Level 2 balance: automatic dynamic balance. The subject is able to shift the center of gravity in all directions beyond the base surface and to maintain a balance in the absence of external chaos. 
Level 3 balance: he dynamic balance. The subjects were able to maintain balance in all directions.

Reference: \n\t\t\t\tCriteria for differentiation: less than or equal to 22 divided into dementia, less than or equal to 15. \n\t\t\t\tThe level of literacy is less than 17, the primary school is less than 20, and the secondary school is less than 24.
